label: game
description: The global game object.

label: workspace
description: The global workspace object.

label: Instance.new
description: Creates a new instance of a Roblox object.

label: print
description: Outputs text to the console.

label: wait
description: Yields the current thread for a specified number of seconds.

label: Vector3.new
description: Creates a new Vector3 object.

label: Part
description: A basic building block in Roblox.

label: BrickColor.new
description: Creates a new BrickColor object.

label: Color3.new
description: Creates a new Color3 object.

label: math.random
description: Generates a random number.

label: Humanoid
description: Represents a character's humanoid properties.

label: Mouse
description: Represents the user's mouse.

label: Players
description: The global Players service.

label: Player
description: Represents a player in the game.

label: UserInputService
description: Provides access to user input.

label: RunService
description: Provides access to the game's run loop.

label: tick
description: Returns the time elapsed since the UNIX epoch.

label: time
description: Returns the time in seconds since the start of the game session.

label: delay
description: Runs a function after a delay.

label: spawn
description: Runs a function on a separate thread.

label: Instance:IsA
description: Checks if an Instance is a certain class.

label: Instance:Clone
description: Creates a copy of the Instance and its descendants.

label: Instance:Destroy
description: Removes the Instance and its descendants.

label: Instance:GetChildren
description: Returns a table containing all the children of the Instance.

label: Instance:FindFirstChild
description: Returns the first child of the Instance with the given name.

label: _G
description: Global environment table.

label: _VERSION
description: Lua version string.

label: Enum
description: Roblox enumeration utility.

label: plugin
description: The plugin object for Roblox Studio plugins.

label: shared
description: Shared data and functions.

label: script
description: The script object representing the current script.

label: DebuggerManager
description: Manages the debugger in Roblox Studio.

label: elapsedTime
description: Elapsed time since the start of the game.

label: LoadLibrary
description: Loads a library in Roblox Lua.

label: PluginManager
description: Manages plugins in Roblox Studio.

label: settings
description: Global settings object.

label: typeof
description: Returns the type of a value.

label: UserSettings
description: User settings and preferences.

label: HumanoidRootPart
description: Represents the root part of a humanoid character.
